with_5_1_1.reason: Energy-momentum conservation preserved for antisymmetric torsion

with_5_2_1.reason: Metric emergence valid for T << 1/l_P; torsion gives O(T²) corrections

with_5_2_3.reason: Torsion included via spin stress-energy in thermodynamic derivation

conclusion: All four theorems (5.1.1, 5.2.1, 5.2.3, 5.3.1) are mutually consistent
